cause.description:
AYUDA supports local diabetes communities, predominantly in Latin America, by helping build local capacity and create impactful, sustainable projects through empowering youth to serve as agents of change.
AYUDA has played a role to support local diabetes communities in Ecuador, Peru, Chile, Mexico, Belize, Bermuda and the Dominican Republic.
1. Our objectives are to: Empower passionate youth to become leaders of social change.
2. Strengthen local diabetes communities by promoting youth leadership.
3. Motivate youth with diabetes to better manage their health
cause.mission: Empower youth to serve as agents of change in diabetes communities around the world
cause.name: AYUDA (American Youth Understanding Diabetes Abroad, Inc.)
